entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:31AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona and southeastern Johnson Counties through 215 AM MDT... At 131 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Teapot Rock, which is also 26 miles north of Casper, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail.
